wikipedia_page.main: Jen Dawson (born 15 October 1979) is a fashion model from Sheffield.

response: Howe married fashion model Jen Dawson in 2007 and they had a daughter, Zuni, in September 2012. They separated in 2015. Howe died unexpectedly of a heart attack in September 2017 at the age of 41, shortly before Little Barrie were scheduled to embark on a tour for their fourth album, Death Express.
